think_procedure: 1. Identify the knob in question: enable_seqscan. 2. Understand the function of enable_seqscan: it controls whether the query planner will use sequential scan plan types. 3. Determine if enable_seqscan has a special value that changes its behavior significantly. 4. Research or recall that setting enable_seqscan to 'off' (or 'false') disables sequential scans, forcing the planner to use other scan types if possible. 5. Conclude that enable_seqscan is a special knob because setting it to 'off' changes its behavior fundamentally, unlike regular numerical knobs where values follow a natural order.
